citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
***The IACUC prepared reports of the semi-annual program review and facility inspection for June 26, 2018 and
November 5, 2018. The reports were not submitted to the Institutional Official. Reports of the semi-annual
evaluations should be provided to the Institutional Official to ensure the facility adheres to the standards and
regulations of the Animal Welfare Act. The 2018 semi-annual reports, and all subsequent reports, must be
submitted to the current Institutional Official. Correct by March 8, 2019.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Laboratory Manager.

narrative:
2.31(c)(3)
INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
***The IACUC prepared reports of the semi-annual program review and facility inspection for June 26, 2018 and
November 5, 2018. The reports were not submitted to the Institutional Official. Reports of the semi-annual
evaluations should be provided to the Institutional Official to ensure the facility adheres to the standards and
regulations of the Animal Welfare Act. The 2018 semi-annual reports, and all subsequent reports, must be
submitted to the current Institutional Official. Correct by March 8, 2019.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Laboratory Manager.
